purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of AI agents using a streamlined, model-driven framework.
principle: Leverages model-driven architecture to simplify the process of building AI agents, focusing on high-level abstractions and code generation.
reusability: Offers a modular framework with reusable components and APIs for easy integration into various projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack extensive documentation and have limited community support.
name: sdk-python
description: A model-driven approach to building AI agents in just a few lines of code.
highlight: Enables rapid development of AI agents with minimal code through a model-driven approach.
